actions.text: On agreeing to the Castor amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Ms. Castor.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Castor amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 110-136 to direct the Secretary of Homeland Security to work with the State of Florida and other States, as appropriate, to resolve the differences between the Transportation Worker Identification Credential and existing access control credentials.
purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 110-136 to direct the Secretary of Homeland Security to work with the State of Florida and other States, as appropriate, to resolve the differences between the Transportation Worker Identification Credential and existing access control credentials.
